name: OtherRevascularization_Grouping
title: Other Revascularization_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for the Other Revascularization exclusion in the Statin Use For Diabetes Care Need
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Other Revascularization Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Other Revascularization Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Other Revascularization Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Other Revascularization Grouping and utilization in patients/users connected health.)
